description: Brown-haired jock Dustin Holloway recently went through a break-up, and in an effort to make his ex jealous, he decided to start looking for a new man! He answered an ad from sexy, chiseled Theo Ross, and agreed to marry him so he could stay in the country, but was disappointed to find out he was straight. Or at least blond-haired Theo made it seem that way! Dustin got home early one day and caught him making out with athletic, tattooed Pierre Fitch. Theo couldn’t risk losing him, so he invited Dustin’s massive cock to join them for a sex-filled threesome.
title: Not Exactly Marriage Material
